title: Why You Must Talk About Money
itunes:summary:
Financial stress is one of the most common reasons for conflict in marriages today. But, it's also something that many couples are uncomfortable talking about. John chats with Greg and Erin about how they've overcome financial challenges in their relationship. Featuring guests Jeff and Shaunti Feldhahn.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Thriving in Love & Money" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-06-22?refcd=1103302

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/why-you-must-talk-about-money/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
